meanings.sent1: The fence safeguarded the garden from curious rabbits.
meanings.sent2: The security guard safeguarded the building during the night.
meanings.sent3: The superhero safeguarded the city from evil villains with his superpowers.
meanings.sent4: Her warm smile safeguarded her from feeling lonely in the new school.
meanings.sent5: The helmet safeguarded his head from injury during the bike ride.

meanings.sent1: The lifeguard safeguarded the swimmers at the pool.
meanings.sent2: The parents always safeguarded their children on the playground.
meanings.sent3: The wise owl safeguarded the forest by keeping an eye on any troublemakers.
meanings.sent4: The password safeguarded the sensitive information from unauthorized access.
meanings.sent5: The seatbelt safeguarded the driver during the sudden stop.
